actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the opposition of the Congress to certain measures for the curtailment of benefits under the medicare and medicaid programs.

summary.text: Makes it the sense of the Congress that no amendments to titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act be enacted for which the amount of expenditures allocated for the above programs for fiscal year 1975 is predicated upon the enactment into law of amendments to titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the opposition of the Congress to certain measures for the curtailment of benefits under the medicare and medicaid programs.
